summary: Universal Credit Act CHAPTER Explanatory Notes have been produced to assist in the understanding of this Act and are available separately £8. Universal Credit Act CHAPTER CONTENTS Universal credit 1 Standard allowance for tax years 2026-27 to 2029- 2 LCWRA element for tax year 2026- 3 Freeze of LCWRA and LCW elements for tax years 2026-27 to 2029- 4 Protected LCWRA amount for tax years 2026-27 to 2029- 5 Legacy employment and support allowance payments Corresponding provision for Northern Ireland 6 Corresponding provision for Northern Ireland Short title 7 Short title Schedule 1 — A mendments to the Universal Credit Regulations 2013 in connection with new amounts of the LCWRA element Schedule 2 — N orthern Ireland: corresponding provision CHARLES III c.
